LOOKING TO SELL YOUR PROPERTY FAST?

We can make you a cash offer and handle all legal fees.

Welcome to WM Property Buyers

We help people in some of these circumstances:

  • In Need of a Quick Sale
  • Financial Trouble
  • Divorce / Separation
  • Reposession
  • Inherited Property
  • Moving Abroad

We are a local property solutions company that specialise in helping people sell their property quickly and at a competitive price. We started the company with the vision of helping those who wish for a quick sale without having to go to the open market.


We strive to help people sell their house, resolve any property related issues and move on with their lives.


You can either contact us by filling in our online form(hyperlink) or giving us a call on 0141…….. Once we have been to see your property we will have a no obligation offer to you within 48 hours. Upon acceptance of our offer we will work with you to establish a sale time that works for you.


We will find a solution that suits your specific needs whatever the situation. All information gathered is private and confidential, there are no obligations on your part and no hidden fees.
